lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Asked by reporters if Falconbridge preferred competing Dome bidder, Calgary, Alberta-based TransCanada PipeLines Ltd to Chicago-based Amoco, James replied, "It makes no difference to me...whoever takes it over is fine by us."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Falconbridge anticipates higher production through the rest of the year and higher average prices this year for precious metals, James added, without elaborating.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said the first quarter loss also stemmed from weaker nickel and ferronickel prices and lower production at the company's Sudbury, Ontario nickel operations and at some Kidd Creek operations.
